# atproto_account (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "atproto_account" "tangled" {
  handle = "tangled.org"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `handle` (String) The handle to look up

### Read-Only

- `did` (String) The resolved DID of this handle
